Greek Isles | Royal Caribbean | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Greek Isles & Italy Cruise 7 Nights | Rome Roundtrip Save up to 60% off the cruise fare for the second guest Book by 30 November 2025. Deal Details Travel Dates 27 September 2026 Sale Ends Nov 30, 2025 Priced From $2,181 per person Enquire Now Save up to 60% off the cruise fare for the second guest Book by 30 November 2025. Description Embark on a 7-night European adventure aboard Odyssey of the Seas, setting sail from historic Rome. Journey across the Aegean and Mediterranean to the dazzling islands of Santorini and Mykonos, uncover ancient wonders in Ephesus, and soak up the vibrant charm of Naples before returning to Rome. Along the way, marvel at breathtaking landscapes, iconic landmarks, and the timeless beauty that makes this region truly unforgettable. Pricing Interior Stateroom (Cat ZI) from $2,181* per person, twin share Ocean View Stateroom (Cat YO) from $2,761* per person, twin share Balcony Stateroom (Cat XB) from $2,793* per person, twin share What's Included Accommodation Meals Entertainment Onboard Activities Adults-only Solarium Fitness Centre Kids & Teens Club Fees and taxes Itinerary Ports and their order are subject to change at the discretion of the cruise line. Day 1 Embark Rome (Civitavecchia), Italy Day 2 At Sea Day 3 Santorini, Greece Day 4 Ephesus (Kusadasi), Turkey Day 5 Mykonos, Greece Day 6 At Sea Day 7 Naples/Capri, Italy Day 8 Disembark Rome (Civitavecchia), Italy Your Ship Odyssey of the Seas Tame the tide on the FlowRider® or feel the freedom of freefall on RipCord® by iFLY®. Get your game on at the largest SeaPlex® ever, with bumper cars and glow-in-the-dark laser tag – plus hit the reimagined upper deck for the most interactive arcade* ever to set sail, including classics like skeeball. Get a taste of authentic trattoria fare with a modern spin at the new Giovanni's℠ Italian Kitchen & Wine Bar*. Enjoy match day classics and ice-cold brews at Playmakers℠ Sports Bar & Arcade*. Head to Wonderland Imaginative Cuisine* for creative plates served with a heaping helping of awe. Set your mood to serene at the adults-only Solarium. Get a front row view from the Music Hall dance floor while cover bands rock like the real thing. Experience the cutting edge tech at Two70® as the space comes alive with aerialists, robots and much more. Terms & Conditions Airfares & Transfers are additional. Pricing is correct as of 07 November 2025, is subject to change and availability at time of booking. Pricing is per person twin share and based on BOGO60 on Local & International Sailings savings applies to new bookings made between 12:01am (AEST) Saturday, 7st November 2025 – 11:59pm (AEST) Sunday, 30th November 2025. Offer applies to local & international sailings* departing from 7th November 2025 onwards. BOGO60 provides up to 60% savings off the price of cruise fare off the second guest booked in the same stateroom as first, full fare paying guest. BOGO60 savings applied to cruise fare at checkout. Experience the world differently.
